title: Oh Oh Lyrics Thanga Magan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Thangamagan Oh Oh Song Lyrics
The First Love of Tamizh
Singer: Dhanush, Nikhita Gandhi
Lyrics: Dhanush

Uyire uyire
uyirin uyirae
uyirae uyir u u
uyirae.

vizhiye vizhiye
vizhiyin vizhiye
vizhi vi vi vizhiye

uyirae
vizhiyae
vizhiyin
u u
uyirae.

idhu bodhai neram
edhuvum pesadhae.
thadu maarinaalum
thayakkam kattadhey.

adiyae adiyae
pudhu vaanam thallaadhae
adiyae adiyae
vizhi thookkam kollaadhae..

adiyae adiyae
ilamai pidiye.
idhalgal inaithu
idhayam kudhippom.

theeraadha pechcu oh oh

kannathil muththam oh oh
muththathin satham oh ooh

poiyaana kovam oh oh
pollaadha kaigal oh oh

unnodum ennodum

oh oh

ondrodu ondraagum
velai oh oh

sollaadha aasai ellaam
neethanae penne
ohoh

thallaadum aayil varai
vendum oh oh
en kadhal paadal ellaam
neethanae penne
oh oh

en maalai neram ellaam
vendum oh oh.
